en-GB.name: Memorable matches
en-GB.desc: Which matches are worth remembering in terms of most TDs, killed and so on?
en-GB.filled: More than X matches have the same record or no record exists at all.
en-GB.tvdiff: Largest TV difference in which underdog won

fr-FR.name: Matchs mémorables
fr-FR.desc: Quelles sont les matchs les plus mémorables pour le nombre de touchdowns, les sorties, etc. ?
fr-FR.filled: More than X matches have the same record or no record exists at all.
fr-FR.svic: La plus large différence de touchdowns
fr-FR.tvdiff: Le plus large écart de valeur dans laquelle le favori a perdu
